name: 蘇春
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

Week 2: 固化與鑄造 Solidification and casting processes (2)
Week 3: 固化與鑄造 Solidification and casting processes (2)
Week 4: 變形期間之應力應變 Stress and strain during deformation (3)
Week 5: 體變形工法 Bulk deformation processes (4)
Week 6: 體變形工法 Bulk deformation processes (4)
Week 7: 鈑成形工法 Sheet forming processes (5)
Week 8: 粉末冶金 Powder metallurgy (6)
Week 9:	期中考 Midterm Exam 
Week 10: 切削工法 Machining processes (7)
Week 11: 切削工法 Machining processes (7)
Week 12: 接合工法 Joining processes (8)
Week 13: 抗磨耗表面改質 Surface modification for wear resistance (9)
Week 14: 材料處理介紹 Introduction to Materials Processing (M1)
Week 15: 固體工法 Solid Processes (M4)
Week 16: 固體工法 Solid Processes (M4)
Week 17: 氣體工法 Vapor Processes (M7)
Week 18:	期末考 Final Exam
